con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="EditionService" targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/EditionService/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.org/EditionService/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/EditionService/" xmlns:Q1="http://www.example.org/beans"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.example.org/beans" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8080/bibliotheques-annecy-ws-webapp/ws/edition?xsd=../beans.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="getListEdition"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="nbEdition" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getListEditionResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="edition" type="Q1:Edition"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getListExemplaire"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="editionId" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getListExemplaireResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="exemplaire" type="Q1:Exemplaire"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getListExemplaireFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="faultMessageErreur" type="xsd:string"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="getListExemplaireRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getListExemplaire" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getListExemplaireResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getListExemplaireResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getListEditionRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getListEdition" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getListEditionResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getListEditionResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getListExemplaireFault"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getListExemplaireFault" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="EditionService"> <wsdl:operation name="getListEdition"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getListEditionRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getListEditionResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getListExemplaire"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getListExemplaireRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getListExemplaireResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:getListExemplaireFault" name="fault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="EditionServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:EditionService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getListEdition"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getListExemplaire"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:binding name="EditionServiceSOAP" type="tns:EditionService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/bibliotheques-annecy-ws-webapp/ws/edition"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> <wsdl:service name="EditionServiceService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:EditionServiceSoapBinding" name="EditionServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/bibliotheques-annecy-ws-webapp/ws/edition"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> <schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/beans" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.org/beans" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <complexType name="Edition"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="isbn" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="dateParution" type="date"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="nbPages" type="int"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="format" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="ouvrage" type="tns:Ouvrage"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="photo" type="tns:Photo"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="editeur" type="tns:Editeur"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="genre" type="tns:Genre"></element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Editeur"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="nomEditeur" type="string"></element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Photo"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="nomPhoto" type="string"></element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Ouvrage"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="titre" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="resume" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="auteur" type="tns:Auteur"></element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Auteur"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="nom" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="prenom" type="string"></element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Genre"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="genre" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Utilisateur"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="civilite" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="nom" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="prenom" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="pseudo" type="string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="adresseMail" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="salt" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="motDePasseSecurise" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="telephone" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="dateNaissance" type="date"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="adresse" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="codePostal" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ville" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="pays" type="string"></element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Bibliotheque"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="nomBibliotheque" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="telephone" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="adresse" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="codePostal" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="ville" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="pays" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Exemplaire"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="bibliotheque" type="tns:Bibliotheque"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="edition" type="tns:Edition"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="nbExemplaires" type="int"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
